{"step_by_step_thinking": "Document [0] and Document [1] both suggest that the histological features of pituitary apoplexy do influence the clinical presentation and outcome. In Document [0], it is stated that patients who presented with histological features of pituitary tumor infarction alone had less severe clinical features on presentation, a longer course prior to presentation, and a better outcome than those presenting with hemorrhagic infarction or frank hemorrhage.
